name: Block Breaker V0.4
description:
Block Breaker V0.4  in this version , i fix the fading screen and the music background  loop , and the exit button from the game , for Windows version.

A old Game , that i wanted to make for a long time. Is still more to build, but this is the level i know to code. In time ill build more to this game, but for now , im very proud , with what is in this game. The game have only 5 levels because, im not able to code new things, if i make more levels will be boring. 

Is only mouse clicks , and mouse use. So no keys involved in this game.

Thank you for playing this game. And see you in the next one. :D
